intro: Meineckia decaryi var. decaryi, commonly known as the Decary's meineckia, is a rare and unique plant native to the tropical rainforests of Madagascar. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes a wide variety of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its delicate, clustered inflorescences and small, white to pale pink flowers. Its leaves are typically opposite and elliptical, with a smooth texture. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a critically endangered species.
